snippet: India is expected to choose Sikorsky Aircraft's S-70B Sea Hawk helicopters at a 16-aircraft tender worth over $1 billion (613.08 million British pound), according to two sources familiar with the matter....

headline.print_headline: Exclusive-India Eyes $1 Billion Sikorsky Helicopter Deal, Other U.S. Arms
headline.main: Exclusive-India Eyes $1 Billion Sikorsky Helicopter Deal, Other U.S. Arms

lead_paragraph: India is expected to choose Sikorsky Aircraft's S-70B Sea Hawk helicopters at a 16-aircraft tender worth over $1 billion (613.08 million British pound), according to two sources familiar with the matter.
